metadata.feature_description: Load activity stream content in pages with 'Get More' and 'Show All' options

steps.expected: Activity stream loads with initial set of posts
steps.actual: Activity stream loaded successfully with 20 posts displayed

steps.action: Verify posts are displayed in the activity stream
steps.expected: Multiple posts visible with timestamps, content, and action buttons
steps.actual: Posts displayed correctly with photos, text, timestamps, Like/Comment/Remove options

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click 'Get More' to load next page

steps.action: Scroll to bottom of activity stream to locate Get More button
steps.expected: Get More button should be visible at the bottom of the posts
steps.actual: Get More button visible at the bottom of the activity stream

steps.expected: Additional posts should load and append to existing posts
steps.actual: Additional 20+ posts loaded successfully, appended to existing posts without page refresh

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click 'Show All' to load all posts

steps.action: Locate Show All button in activity stream
steps.expected: Show All button should be visible when viewing a specific journal item
steps.actual: Show All button is only visible when settings.journalId > 0 (viewing specific journal item). This is by design - the button is not shown in the main activity feed view.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct number of posts per page

steps.action: Count initial posts loaded and verify against configured page size
steps.expected: Default page size of 20 posts should be loaded initially
steps.actual: Initial load displays 20 posts as configured in dnn.activityStream.GroupedJournalControl.js (pageSize = 20)

steps.action: Click Get More and verify additional posts loaded
steps.actual: Additional posts loaded successfully, maintaining the page size configuration

steps.action: Select 'Photos' filter from the activity type dropdown
steps.expected: Activity stream should filter to show only photo posts
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully, only 5 photo posts displayed

steps.expected: Only photo posts should be visible, Get More hidden if fewer than page size
steps.actual: Photo posts displayed correctly. Get More button hidden because total photo posts (5) is less than page size (20)

steps.action: Clear filter to restore all posts
steps.expected: All posts should be visible again with Get More button
steps.actual: Filter cleared successfully, all posts restored, Get More button visible again

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify scroll position after loading more

steps.action: Record scroll position before clicking Get More (scrollY = 2648px)
Click Get More button and check scroll position after load
steps.expected: Scroll position should be maintained at or near the original position
steps.actual: Scroll position perfectly maintained at 2648px after loading more posts - no unexpected scrolling occurred

observations: The 'Show All' button is only visible when viewing a specific journal item (settings.journalId > 0). This is by design in dnn.activityStream.ListView.js - the button does not appear in the main activity feed view.
Default page size is 20 posts as configured in dnn.activityStream.GroupedJournalControl.js
The Get More button uses AJAX to load additional posts without page refresh, providing smooth user experience
Filter dropdown correctly filters activity types and adjusts pagination visibility based on result count
Custom Activity Stream Filters panel on the right side provides saved filter options like 'Photos and Wiki Filter'
